channel.title: How do i make a pickup command?
channel.description: i was wondering if someone could help me make a pickup command for my server?

lol it does matter man if u want the command to be silab or not and if i no “what”… sever he gots then i can tell him if it should be silab pickup or not i got both

item.title: How do i make a pickup command?
item.dc:creator: @Mayhem_Maker Mayhem Maker
item.description:
@Mayhem_Maker wrote:

Krackkid,the source doesn’t matter and please use “What” instead of “wat”.At least try to be educated,and for Sinura,Add this command in your client.java with your other commands:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage("configured for silabsoft, pickup 00995 1 "); }

That above is for a silabs server,assuming you have one.Mostly everyone does.
